name: Pong (itch) (Violet Fox)
description:
(PLAY ON FULL SCREEN MODE)
A simple Pong arcade game 

The game is meant to be played with two players on one keyboard.

The  Controlls:

W&S:  To controller the Blue Player.

Up&Down (Arrows): To controller the Red Player.

Space: Launch the Ball (can be you used if the ball stopped moving or became really slow).

R: To restart the game

Have Fun ^_^
